item.title: Auto Load-Off Test
item.description:
Overview

Auto Load-Off Test is a Python-based hardware test automation tool designed to replace repetitive manual load-off testing workflows in lab environments.

The system automates signal generation, measurement, data logging, and result visualization, significantly improving test efficiency and consistency.

Problem

Manual load-off testing requires repeated configuration of test instruments, data recording, and plotting, which is:

  • Time-consuming
  • Error-prone
  • Hard to reproduce consistently
